website_summaries.verdict: Kids of the 1980s remember the scented sticker fad – and kids today can enjoy them, too, with this large collection.
pros: Not your average stickers, as they emit scents when you scratch them
Scents are grouped and wrapped accordingly to keep them true and lasting
Stickers are a nice size and easy for little hands to work with
cons: Some scents are stronger than others
A few of the scents didn't appeal to adults, but most kids were excited to have such a large variety

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddlers !
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are the best yet! Unlike the puffy stickers I previously bought, these scented stickers are larger and much easier for a toddler to handle. We mailed a small 4X6 photo album from the dollar store to our 20 month old granddaughter to use as a sticker book and we mail a little note card with several stickers to her each week. She loves these little memories we're making together! So, we go through lots of stickers. This pkg is a fantastic bargain! I was concerned that the scents would be too strong but they're not at all. Each individual pkg has it's own scent . This grandma will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: yarnlover

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smelling stickers!
customer_reviews.text: My students LOVE these stickers! My only request is that you make more scents! I give them one each week on thier folders if thier homework is completely finished for the week. It had been a great and cheap inventive for my students to complete thier work. I think about the fact that I still have my folder with smelly stickers (that still smell) from when I was a kid. Maybe they will keep this forever too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Quality stickers with scent that really lasts! Don't be fooled by cheaper substitutes!
customer_reviews.text: I am coming back to review this product after being recently suckered into buying something cheaper. I thought all scratch 'n sniff stickers were basically the same. But now, after comparing, I can say that the Purple Ladybug stickers are the best I've tried. Others loose their scent not long after taking these from the bag, but the Purple Ladybug stickers retain their scents. My students love these and I will definitely be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Tennessen

customer_reviews.title: My students can't get enough of these
customer_reviews.text: I teach private music lessons -- my students LIVE for the end of the lesson when they get one of these stickers. They love smelling different scents and choosing their favorite ones. Many of my students literally collect them - they put them on their binders, on special sheets, on their books, etc. Some students collect different scents in groups and love smelling them all at once. **The scents of these stickers last so long! I got them in April of this year, and they're still smelling great on my student's binders. (after 6 months!) I absolutely can't recommend them enough. I've tried other scented stickers, and these are miles ahead of all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Lawalin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I teach an SDC class, and some of the kids love heavily scented stuff. I ordered these as prizes. The teacher next door said the scent on these would go away quickly. At first I thought “that sucks”, but then I put one on a toy we had in the room and left it for a week. When I smelled it it still smelled strongly. She was wrong. Great quality for the money. My nurse and I think the mint stinks, but my assistant likes that and hates the “corn” (popcorn)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Buhn

customer_reviews.title: My students LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired educator and now substitute teach a few times a week. In my "sub bag" I always carry extra pencils, pens, a book to read (just in case) and FOR SURE several packs of these Scratch and Sniff Stickers. My students love them! I now have a reputation as the "Sticker Lady" and would not dare show up without these. Of course I dispense them to everyone but only after the task is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ann R. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: I used to love getting these in school!
customer_reviews.text: When schooling took a distance learning approach this year, I wanted to find some little way of letting my daughter know she did a great job on tests and school work. I remember how excited I got when I did well on a test and I had a scratch-n-sniff sticker, so I started searching for some. These are fantastic! Cute designs and they hit the smells of each "flavor" spot-on! They also brought a huge smile to my daughter's face! Mission accomplished! Huge value to me...a few bucks invested and I've recieved many priceless smiles in return!
customer_reviews.author: Cpt. Xavior Redbeard

customer_reviews.title: Students love these stickers
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I looked everywhere for smelly stickers for cheap since I give them to my students as rewards. These fit the bill perfectly. The scents are great. My middle school students love these stickers enough to actually do their math homework when they know they’ll get a sticker as a reward. If you know middle schoolers, that says something about these stickers!
customer_reviews.author: Bradi D Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Great Smelly Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased smelly stickers from this company. My 5th graders love to get them on their test papers! The scents are good, the graphics are cute, and it is an all-around good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Interesting smells. Weird corn scented one lol
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The smells are interesting. The weird one is corn lol. The funniest thing is that on the apple sheets there is a row of strawberries hahahha. They kinda look like the apples did I get it :) I used these as pinata stuffers and they are a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Luna Fam

customer_reviews.title: Great Assortment!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to add some faux food fun to a birthday celebration that included a kid with multiple food allergies. They are so goofy and strongly scented! Perfect for my daughter and her friends to enjoy. So many of them as well - we were able to clip them out in three sticker groups so I know they will last a long time for future celebrations! And as extra gifts for teacher supplies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: s_del

customer_reviews.title: Even high school students love them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to give to my students, and, while it may be hard to believe, high school students love getting stickers. They especially love smelly stickers. These smell really good, and since they are packaged separately, they maintain their distinctive scents.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 Great smelly stickers for classroom incentive
customer_reviews.text: Students love these! A great silly incentive. The smell is strong and the price for amount is on point. I wish the paper was a little thicker/more resilient. But this is a great classroom product. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: This stickers are cute and have a very strong scent. I love that they come in individual pouches, so each one keeps its own scent longer. I'm a teacher and my students love these!
customer_reviews.author: Tsutsuji

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but not great!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of stickers! Some smell good...some not so much! Most kids on my caseload like them EXCEPT a handful if my autistic kids. I will probably try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Nwebb

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten students love them
customer_reviews.text: I use stickers as a reward for students who deliver messages to me at the primary school where I am employed. The younger students are now all choosing only the scented Ladybug stickers. They say they smell just like the fruit or whatever scent it is. Some of the older students who normally don't take stickers want these. I was very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid favorite!
customer_reviews.text: As the Director of an early learning center- I am always looking for something to reward children for their good behavior, or as an incentive to accomplish something new. these are just the ticket! The children love them, and are very excited to receive them...bonus, they smell AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Yankees Chick!

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing- strong enough I’m not worried about them fading super fast, but not sickly strong. We used these in self-care bags for clients at my work - they’re a perfect way to stimulate sense of smell without using something potentially messy like essential oils or scented dough/slime.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I am a music teacher and look for many ways to motivate the kids. They love earning their smelly sticker and getting to pick out their scent of choice. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a kindergarten class party (25 5 & 6 year olds). Each sheet is entirely one theme/smell (chocolate, peppermint, strawberry, etc) so the kids could trade with each other if they wanted. The smell is nice, clear, and pleasant but not too strong. This is a quality product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good smells!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are great for kids and the smells are strong! Unfortunately I wasn't given every smell listed, and was rather sent extra peppermint sheets (ewwww). It would be nice to have known that this could happen, as it wasn't expected.
customer_reviews.author: ShenanigansPower

customer_reviews.title: Amazing variety of scents!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are absolutely amazing! I teach high school, and I give out scratch and sniff stickers to my students that get A's on my quizzes, tests, and other assessments. These stickers are so awesome, my students are BEGGING me to give out stickers for B's. You should hear them fighting over which scent is the best! One of my students got a watermelon sticker, and I quote, said "oh my God, I could wipe this all over me and wear this as cologne!"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stickers are a fun variety of different scents
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are a fun variety of different scents. My students especially love the cherry and chocolate scents. They stick well to most everything yet are easily removed from the furniture. They colors are a little muted, but my students haven't complained.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good but.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My second graders beg for me to pull them out for their papers! The popcorn scent was a mixed review. Some smell more “soapy” than others but all around win in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great scents! I'm a high school teacher and use these to congratulate those receiving a perfect score on our weekly vocabulary quiz. Even though my students are teens, they love these stickers. I just ordered a second set so I won't run out :)
customer_reviews.author: Begsmom

customer_reviews.title: Not Much Scent
customer_reviews.text: These scratch and sniff stickers were a disappointment. You can barely smell them and nothing like the real thing. I do not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D Black

customer_reviews.title: Realistic scent on the scratch and sniff stickers
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I've used this brand of scratch and sniff stickers with my students. The scents are wonderful. My students are happy that I chose these stickers. The scents are authentic. The scent is not overpowering and realistic.
customer_reviews.author: AKindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these! My students love them. They are not the stickiest stickers but they still stay on the page. The kids want to take them off and wear them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Really cool selection of great scents, however the pictures on the stickers could be cuter.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool selection of great scents, however the pictures on the stickers could be cuter. I bought these stickers for my family and they absolutely loved them. WARNING: Do not smell the corn stickers. They smell HORRIBLE! But the other smells are really great.
customer_reviews.author: Tosia Sadowska

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for reward incentive for school. The kids can't wait to earn them to see what they smell like. Good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My students love these. I also like how each scent is individually packaged so they don't all end up smelling the same.
customer_reviews.author: Botis

customer_reviews.title: Not good stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Individual packages- only 1 scented sticker sheet in each & only mint scented. Other star stickers are all falling apart & don't stick. Very low quality. Would not recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Windels

customer_reviews.title: Nice smells
customer_reviews.text: These have some great scents!! This is an excellent reward in the classroom! Smells like popcorn were unexpected but great!
customer_reviews.author: MomnCrew6

customer_reviews.title: Potent smells
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are awesome! The smells are strong (in a good way)! I’m a substitute teacher and use these as incentives for students to stay on task- and they work! Students of ALL AGES (including high school seniors) love them!
customer_reviews.author: Meow Glitter Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Students love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids are obsessed with these stickers. They love discovering all of the different scents, and they will do a lot to earn them. As far as scented stickers go, these ones smell better than most. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great but not super sticky
customer_reviews.text: My students are obsessed but they aren’t very sticky... I find them all over my room over time....
customer_reviews.author: Abby Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great sticker... scented...
customer_reviews.text: The school kids really like it. I just didn’t give 5 stars because I wish It could take each sticker individuals in squares... I just had to use scissors and cut each sticker in squares. Sometimes the kids want to take them home and use them later.. reason why they don’t want them sticking... just a suggestion :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 girls

customer_reviews.title: Great Stickers
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to keep my kids motivated to do their school work at home. Great smell and cute pictures.
customer_reviews.author: hlee7

customer_reviews.title: smell amazing!
customer_reviews.text: love ..LOVE these stickers...they are the best sctatch and sniff stickers i have ever had ..or smelled !! NO JOKE ! And im a sticker junky...my friend all love them too ...i always surprise them with a nice scented treat on letters and..packages ... :)
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE

customer_reviews.title: Great for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time getting these stickers for my classroom. My kiddos love them and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: My 5th graders love getting smelly stickers on their A papers and for their great behavior. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jukesbox

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety and quantity of stickers you obtain for the low price. I give them to students that do well on quizzes and tests, and they seem to stick well to paper, so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sohail F.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Using these for incentives and students and clients really enjoying these. There are some interesting scents that I could do without but overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stickers smell great with long lasting scent. My students are loving them!
customer_reviews.author: Beth M. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Large size and distinct scents
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are very large, about the size of a half dollar coin. Each scent is distinct. Each sheet has one scent but different designs and are packaged individually. These work great as reward stickers versus the smaller ones students use to track points for reading. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: great stickers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really enjoyed these stickers. They were larger than I had expected, and they have nice scents.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: The best scented stickers I've found!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite scented stickers! I've tried several brands, but purple ladybug has the best scents. I bought another brand and ended up only using a few before I quickly recorder purple ladybug. Each scent comes individually wrapped so there's no mixing of the scents. My students love the surprise of guessing which scent I'm going to give them each day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. The only smell they had what that of a faint mildew smell. Absolutely no resemblance to what they were supposed to be. I don't know who was more disappointed, me or my grandchildren. I will not be purchasing from this merchant ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very popular among my students
customer_reviews.text: These are the most popular stickers I have. My students love collecting the different smells, and they actually don't smell half bad. I like the assortment of scents. These will last a while in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Francis

customer_reviews.title: The smells are actually pretty good. I remember scratch and sniff stickers when ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised when I pulled these out! The smells are actually pretty good. I remember scratch and sniff stickers when I was a kid kind of had an artificial smell to them, these definitely don't. The fruit smells like fruit, the peppermint smells like peppermint. Overall we really enjoy and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Stickers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for even a 2 year old. So many stickers that i can give her a sheet a day and be entertained for month!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best scratch and sniff stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super fast shipping and exactly as described. Using these at my job to make "breathing sticks" for children (a way to calm down). Hoping the delightful scents will encourage long, deep breaths! Can't wait to use them in practice.
customer_reviews.author: Momofsix

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These are great reward stickers. My students loved the scent of them and how long it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great value, awesome scents
customer_reviews.text: Each sheet is packaged individually so they smell strong and keep their fabulous scents. Any kid will love these. I highly recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: The adults loved them as much as the students
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at my school! The adults loved them as much as the students. Takes me back to my childhood!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Labovitz

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: NOT like I remember when I was a kid! Dull colors. Pictures a bit boring.
customer_reviews.author: michelle luna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the strongest smelling stickers I've ever purchased...and I've purchased many. They last long. They have appealing designs (you can guess the smell by the image). I will continue to purchase from this company for as long as I can.
customer_reviews.author: TaraHill

customer_reviews.title: Students love them!
customer_reviews.text: I teach 8th grade science and give stickers when students complete their daily assignments. I wasn’t sure if 13 year olds would be into stickers, but they LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I hoped and a little bonus pack too! I'm using stickers as rewards to help potty train a little boy. He saw these and ran straight to the potty lol. They smell amazing! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them and I like the individual packaging. That's the best idea ever. I shared them with another teacher at my school. She loves lady bugs and I love purple. What a great name.
customer_reviews.author: Rd

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and these stickers are prizes in my room. The kids just love these!
customer_reviews.author: Octopus91

customer_reviews.title: Smell fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: These smell absolutely delicious and yummy and amazing!!! Stands true to packaging and came with freebies!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Biasiucci

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: Oh my lands! Students love these! I just wish they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: A great variety at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Students love getting these! They are a great incentive! The scents are pretty strong (no need to scratch and sniff) and there are some interesting scents (like buttered popcorn).
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love them and would buy again when I run out
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are nothing but a trip down memory lane. The smells are strong and long lasting. I use them for my students for piano lessons and they look forward to finishing a page to get their sticker. Love them and would buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Not what you remember from the 80s
customer_reviews.text: Some of these smell ok. The quality is OK. I was looking for a nostalgic 80s scratch and sniff. This was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: Smell great but don't stick well
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th time buying these stickers. I track K-5 math and all of my kids get so excited when I make them guess the scent! The stickers smell fantastic however, they do not stick as well as the ones I bought in the past. I'm a little disappointed and will probably try a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Students love them but some packets had no smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great for classrooms
customer_reviews.text: My students live for these! There's a corn scent which they think is hilarious. Everything else smells pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of scents. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pabby

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell, but....
customer_reviews.text: Because each sheet is individually wrapped, the stickers do smell like advertised. They aren't very colorful, the wrap is difficult to peel and is a waste of resources. Trend stickers aren't individually wrapped and they retain their individual smells quite well. The kids prefer Trend brand stinky stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeekt

customer_reviews.title: Fun stickers for reasonable price. ;)
customer_reviews.text: This is the second or third time I've bought them and I have come to the reality that they are rather reasonable for the price, and for 5th graders who are sometimes the hardest critics especially when using stickers to congratulate their work, they usually love them every year, and will often work hard to earn their sticker for a job well done! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hall

customer_reviews.title: These smell so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: My students are crazy about these stickers. They are so excited when I put them on their papers!!! I have tried scratch and sniff stickers before that have hardly any smell to them, but these are not like that. The smell on these is very strong. So far they have enjoyed the raspberry smelling ones the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scents!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with scented sticker and love that they are still around. Huge motivator for my 5th grade class, and they love when I whip out a new scent!
customer_reviews.author: jgg

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons teacher for class rewards. The teacher loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling stickers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the grandkids, but I can’t stop scratching and sniffing them. They smell wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaWarner

customer_reviews.title: Love these smelly stickers!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome deal on these wonderfully smelly stickers! I can't wait to use these as a daily reward for working hard with my kindergarteners!
customer_reviews.author: TheMotherOfSons

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: these are fun! the kids had a blast going through and sniffing them, some smelled great, some didn't.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great smelly stickers for students!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my classroom and have been so pleased! They have a strong, pleasant smell and the kids LOVE them! They take me back to when I got smelly stickers when I was younger. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Smcoyle

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: True scents that last a long time. A big hit with my students!!
customer_reviews.author: Bcky2323

customer_reviews.title: Great smells
customer_reviews.text: Love your stickers! The only one I don't really care for is the corn scent. All others are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dingledine

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best scratch and sniff stickers I have purchased and a great value. My elementary students love them and I love that each scent is wrapped separately. They last longer and the scents do not mix. I am ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Love my stickers!!
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with my scented stickers! They are great quality, have lots of different scents, and my students love them! They’ve even helped with parents signing daily planners...the parents want to see what the scent of the day is!! Great quality at a very reasonable price. I will definitely purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: momteacher

customer_reviews.title: Brings me back to my childhood..
customer_reviews.text: My kids and daycare kids LOVED these stickers! They brought me back to my childhood! Lovely quaility! I will definitely be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jubran

customer_reviews.title: Strongly scented, but awesome
customer_reviews.text: My students loved the stickers. They are a little strong to start with, but mellow out after being exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper99

customer_reviews.title: Best scratch and sniff stickers available!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter’s 7th birthday. She is crazy about them. They are some of the best scratch and sniff stickers I have ever encountered. The smell lasts a long long time, and becomes strong again when scratched again. Like all Purple Ladybug products, it’s a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Carr

customer_reviews.title: Stinky stickers stop stinky attitudes
customer_reviews.text: These never disappoint, scent is strong but not overwhelming. My students love them as incentives.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely LOVE these stickers
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely LOVE these stickers! They were getting tired of regular star stickers so I got these for a change and that's all they want now!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: but if she's anything like me when I was 9 yrs old
customer_reviews.text: I don't know. I gave them to my grand-cousin, along with your puffy stickers, and haven't heard from her yet, but if she's anything like me when I was 9 yrs old, she"ll love 'em
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 9-year old. She loves them. Enough stickers to share generously with friends. Good value and quality. Bonus stickers are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: TFO

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic!
customer_reviews.text: Brings back old memories, with the scratch and sniff stickers. Fun collection.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie B

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell .. But great smell though
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell, but only a few smell good.. The chocolate, corn and banana are gross .. Watermelon and cherry are excellent.. Kids dig em
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Student will love them
customer_reviews.text: All my class enjoyed these stickers. The amount of volunteers increased a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J.Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smell!
customer_reviews.text: These smell absolutely fantastic! I ordered them for a Special Ed elementary school class, and the scents can be smelled through masks. The kids absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: H. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but doesn’t stick!
customer_reviews.text: The kids were very excited and loved the smells but the sticker’s adhesive does not hold! They fall off anything, including paper, within a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: John Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: These stickers were a big hit with my K-5 students ...
customer_reviews.text: These stickers were a big hit with my K-5 students. The smells are strong and pleasant. The fruity smells were especially popular, and the phrases and pictures are cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: g jqberwokeys

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I and my music students are LOVING these stickers! The scents are adorable- everything from 'cake' to 'chocolate, 'strawberry' to 'peppermint', 'corn'- that smells like popcorn! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Songwriter2898

customer_reviews.title: Smell great
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are awesome! They smell so good and everything has a different smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nitzsche

customer_reviews.title: Even high schoolers love them!
customer_reviews.text: The scents on these are amazing! My high schoolers love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for school
customer_reviews.text: I love these for school. I really miss the 1980s ones that smelled like pizza, pickles and skunk. Those were awesome. Please make stickers like the old school ones.
customer_reviews.author: EStout

product_meta.title: Purple Ladybug 45 Sheets of Scratch and Sniff Stickers for Kids & Teachers with 15 Different Scratch N Sniff Intense Smells! Motivational Smelly Stickers & Super Scented Reward Stickers for Students!
feature_bullets: SUPER SMELLY STICKERS! Our Assorted Mega Pack Motivational Stickers have long-lasting smells, with each scent separately wrapped in its own sleeve to maintain ultimate freshness! These intense smells will bring back memories of the vintage, old school scratch and sniff stickers from the 1980s!

OUTSTANDING BULK VALUE, 675 STICKERS -- WOW! 45 sheets with 15 stickers each. In each package, there are 3 Sticker Sheets of each of 15 completely different smells with 3 different fun designs for each smell! Amazing variety of scents: cherry, banana, peach, strawberry, apple, grape, chocolate, watermelon, cake, lemon, peppermint, corn, orange, raspberry & blueberry - Amazing Scratch And Sniff Value for Teachers, Parents, Kids & Even Adults! Great for rewards, incentives, and motivation!

FREE SAMPLE PACK INCLUDED: Included in the box you also get our BONUS Purple Ladybug Novelty sample set, including one sheet of Scratch 'N Sniff Stickers (in addition to what's in the box), 2 sheets of assorted reward stickers, one small sheet of rainbow scratch paper with mini scratcher-style stylus, and one 3D Puffy sticker sheet; Enjoy!
YOU GET WHAT YOU SEE IN THE PHOTOS: Don't worry about seeing a design you love in the photos and not getting it in your pack, EVERYTHING you see is what you get!

YOUR SATISFACTION, GUARANTEED: Beware of fakes. The Purple Ladybug heading sticker on each sheet, our bright green box and buying from an authorized seller is your guarantee of Purple Ladybug Novelty quality; If you're not completely satisfied with anything you get from us, contact us and we'll make it right, guaranteed!
